message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
I understand that $9,500 is a bit lower than what I was initially looking for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $11,000.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm sticking with my offer of $9,500. It's a fair price for both of us, and I believe it reflects the value of the product.

I understand that you're sticking to your offer, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product to you for $10,500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings.
